Edges-Combat -- Male Hearth Elf Heroic Avenger
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d6 Strength: d8 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes:
Agile: +1 Agility step
Cold Blooded: -2 Vigor (cold weather effects)
Skills (25 Points):
Fighting: (agi) d8 Shooting: (agi) d8 Throwing: (agi) d8
Notice: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d10
Riding: (agi) d8 Survival: (sma) d10
Languages: Aspirian; Auld Saxa; Battletongue; Hearth Elven; Vendahl
Skill Notes:
All Thumbs: -2 Repair/Roll of 1 breaks device
Mounted Combatant: Ignores 2 penalty points on Riding; successful Ride gives mount +2 Pace; may spend Benny to Soak mount damage
Pathfinder: Allies may move through scouted difficult terrain at 2/3 Pace
Size: 0 Deity: The Unknowable One
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 8; Skill: 10
Features
Edges (4 points): Armor Piercing Shot; Charge; Fast Mount; Fighting Withdrawal; Lurker; Mounted Combatant; Pathfinder; Quick Reactions; Running Throw; Steal Away Hindrances: Cold Blooded; Leysingi; Wanted+ Hearth Elf Features: Agile; All Thumbs; Forest-Born; Low Light Vision; Natural Realms
Feature Notes:
Leysingi: Former thrall
Low Light Vision: Ignores penalties for dim and dark illumination
Natural Realms: Treats Elfhomes as wilds
Wanted+: Has significant trouble with local law enforcement
Combat
Parry: 7 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Hide Shield: Small Shield Weapons: Flail (d8+d6); Lance (d8+d8); Long Spear (d8+d6); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Armor Piercing Shot: +2 AP with bows
Charge: Free melee attack after run
Fast Mount: Mount and dismount as free actions 1/rd
Fighting Withdrawal: May Defend while running and move full Pace during Full Defense
Forest-Born: No difficult terrain penalty in forests
Long Spear Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Lurker: Parry +1 while using Full Defense
Quick Reactions: May take limited actions when surprised
Running Throw: +2 thrown weapon range after moving half Pace
Steal Away: Successful Stealth allows withdrawal without attack
Notes
Validation Errors: Edge Allocation: 4 available vs. 10 allocated
